post.content: The results are in and the news are fantastic. “Lucid Dreams” opened on the top spot for the April 2012 ZMR Top 100 radio charts. Many thanks to everyone who has supported and/or been involved with this project.

post.title: 'Lucid Dreams' Opens At Number One
